static int SeedBufferSize [get]
 Size of the seed buffer.
 

Detailed Description

Random number generator class.

Cryptographically secure RNG. The underlying RNG uses a FIPS-approved algorithm based on HMAC with SHA-256.

Member Function Documentation

◆ Rand()

array< System::Byte > IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::Rand ( unsigned int  nBufferLength)

Generate a random byte array.

Parameters
[in]nBufferLengthLength of the input buffer.

This function returns a byte array with random byte values produced by the crypto random number generator.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns a random byte array.
See also
SrandAuto, Srand, RandByte, RandInt16, RandInt32, RandInt64

◆ RandByte() [1/2]

System::Byte IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::RandByte ( )

Generate a random byte.

This function returns a random byte value produced by the crypto random number generator between 0 and 255.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns random byte.
See also
SrandAuto, Srand, Rand, RandInt16, RandInt32, RandInt64

◆ RandByte() [2/2]

System::Byte IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::RandByte ( System::Byte  byMin,
System::Byte  byMax 
)

Generate a random byte within a specified range.

Parameters
[in]byMinThe minimum random value.
[in]byMaxThe maximum random value.

This function returns a random byte value produced by the crypto random number generator within the range of nMin and nMax, inclusive.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns random byte.
See also
SrandAuto, Srand, Rand, RandInt16, RandInt32, RandInt64

◆ RandInt16() [1/2]

Int16 IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::RandInt16 ( )

Generate a random 16-bit signed integer.

This function returns a random 16-bit signed integer value produced by the crypto random number generator in the range of 16 bit signed values.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns a random 16-bit signed integer value.
See also
SrandAuto, Srand, Rand, RandByte, RandInt32, RandInt64

Generate a random 16-bit signed integer within a specified range.

Parameters
[in]nMinThe minimum random value.
[in]nMaxThe maximum random value.

This function returns a random 16-bit signed integer value produced by the crypto random number generator within the range of nMin and nMax, inclusive.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns a random 16-bit signed integer value.

◆ Srand()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::Srand ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbyInputBuffer)

Seed the crypto random number generator.

Parameters
[in]mpbyInputBufferThe input buffer. It MUST be 32 bytes long.

This function seeds the random number generator with a provided 32-byte array.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

See also
SrandAuto, Rand, RandByte, RandInt16, RandInt32, RandInt64, SeedBufferSize

◆ SrandAuto()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::CryptoRng::SrandAuto ( )

Seed the crypto random number generator.

This function automatically seeds the random number generator from a platform-specific source of entropy.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

See also
Srand, Rand, RandByte, RandInt16, RandInt32, RandInt64
